summary: CoverPage text updates appear implemented and the portrait is referenced, but the required new static portrait asset under frontend/public/assets/generated is not shown as added in the diff. There are also broader global CSS/palette changes that were not requested by REQ-9/REQ-10.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new static image asset derived from the uploaded portrait under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference it from the cover page component.
missing_requirements.reason: The CoverPage references /assets/generated/shivangi-portrait.dim_900x1200.jpg, but the diff shows no added files, so the required new portrait asset is not evidenced as added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: File diff summary: ADDED FILES: none

hallucinated_features.description: Broad global editorial palette/color-token changes in frontend/src/index.css (beyond cover-page portrait + copy update).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9/REQ-10 request updating the cover page (portrait + specific cover text) and keeping overall layout style; they do not request revising the global OKLCH palette variables or other global style tokens.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (large set of :root and .dark CSS variable edits for background/foreground/primary/etc. plus editorial-specific tokens)

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/usage of a cover CTA line: “Click right to explore →”.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 only specifies changing the top-left label, year label, and three highlight lines; it does not request adding or changing a call-to-action line.
